problem: Translate data-attr To Persian number & can't use DOM in HTML page
solution:
We See this Problem just in Chrome, not in opera , fireFox & Edge, We didn't See any Problem.
after Change region to Iran and use Persian font 'vazir', data-attr in HTML Page Tarnslate to Persian numbar, this is very bad Problem, in this State we can't use DOM, Lisiner & etc ... in JavaScript.
we had to Write onload function after load HTML page and before load JavaScript code, then select all of data-attr & Elements with Problems and Convert persian numbers to english number with regexp.

after using nodemaile module in createTransporter function, i had config problem, because google authentication changed.
in this change, you can't use auth1 for connect to smtp google, you must use auth2 for connect this.

example for this sulotion :

const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({
service: 'gmail',
host: 'smtp.gmail.com',
auth: {
user: 'example',
pass: 'auth2 password',
method: 'XOAUTH2'
}
})

in user need write useranme // email address in username invalid
in pass need you turn on auth2 in your google gmail managment after them create new key for nodemailer, gmail create 16char password, copy this password and write in pass

it's done, your nodejs email panel is configed
